title: Relational Contracting and Construction Project Learning: A Nordic Case Study

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners are practitioners with experience in or interest in relational contracting in the field, consuming short-form learning modules via mobile devices. Project-based assessments verify real-world case analysis capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the introduction of relational contracting and policy changes in Nordic countries.
Learners can assess the advantages and limitations of relational contracts in construction projects through case analysis.
Learners can derive success conditions and learning barriers of relational contracts through literature analysis.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
